name: Domotichaos
description:
Game Name: Domotichaos | Ludum Dare 50 Entry (Theme: Delay the inevitable)

Your grandson has gifted you a new Alexia, he even set it up for you and everything. Unfortunately it has gone crazy and it likes to turn your lights and devices on. If too many things are turned on at once the fuses will blow! Try your best to avoid disaster!

Controls

Recommended with XBOX Controller

    - WASD or Left Joystick to move around 

    - F/SPACE or A Button to interact

    - Escape or Start to pause

    - Escape or B to un-pause

This is has been made by 5 people during the course of the Ludum Dare 50:

Source Code: https://github.com/DanielBT-97/LudumDare50_Domotichaos
